events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but I want to return it because the size does not fit me properly and I would like a full refund.
The case was reviewed and assigned to the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for a return and money back.
The case was routed to the refund handling team for further assistance with the return process.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 1234567890. Yes, the jacket is completely new, unworn, and still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund once the item is received at our return center. We will send you the return instructions shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate receiving the instructions so I can send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have sent you an email with the return shipping label and instructions. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and that your refund process is going smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
The refund has been processed successfully and the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent a survey regarding your experience with the refund process. Your feedback is important to us.
